name: Warm-up Training
activities: Jogging in place, Jumping Jacks, High Knees, Butt Kicks, Arm Circles, Leg Swings, Torso Twists, Shoulder Rolls, Lunges, Dynamic Stretches, Side Shuffle, Toe Touches.

name: Technical Skills Training
activities: Passing drills, Shooting practice, Dribbling exercises, Agility ladder, Cone drills, Tactical simulations, Strength training, Speed sprints, Defensive positioning, Ball control drills, Heading practice, Set piece training.

name: Tactical Training
activities: Formations analysis, Team positioning drills, Tactical game simulations, Defensive shape training, Counter-attack strategies, Pressing exercises, Attacking patterns, Defensive transitions.

name: Physical Training
activities: Running sprints, Plyometric exercises, Weightlifting, Circuit training, Interval training, Agility drills, Cardiovascular workouts, Core strengthening, Resistance training, Flexibility exercises, High-intensity interval training, Endurance workouts.

name: Mental Skills Training
activities: Visualization exercises, Goal setting, Positive self-talk, Mindfulness meditation, Concentration drills, Imagery practice, Stress management techniques, Emotional regulation training, Mental toughness exercises, Decision-making simulations, Focus training, Confidence building activities.

name: Game Situations Training
activities: Small-sided games, Scrimmages, Game simulations, Position-specific drills, Game strategy discussions, Transition training, Game-related fitness exercises, Decision-making scenarios, Game-condition shooting practice, Team-building activities, Game analysis sessions, Game pressure simulations.

name: Positioning Training
activities: Defensive positioning drills, Offensive positioning practice, Transition positioning exercises, Communication exercises, Anticipation drills, Marking and tracking practice, Support play training, Spatial awareness drills, Position-specific simulations, Off-the-ball movement practice, Defensive covering exercises, Overlapping and underlapping runs.
